title: Koi Chiropractic and Acupuncture
description: Medical Care in a Serene Atmosphere
cleaned_text: Ste 108 Rancho Cucamonga CA, 91730 ](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Koi+Chiropractic+and+Acupuncture/@34.0896479,-117.5745665,15z/data=!4m6!3m5!1s0x80c34a35925eb74b:0x2985c2b815a173d0!8m2!3d34.0896479!4d-117.5745665!16s%2Fg%2F1tzgphbz?entry=ttu) Our office was formally known as Fontana Chiropractic and Acupuncture. Our office consists of the same team and the same quality of care. Thank you for your interest in learning about Koi Chiropractic and Acupuncture. Our clinic is dedicated to helping you find harmony within your body. We provide multiple specialists, individual rooms, quiet atmosphere, and affordable care. Commonly we treat using chiropractic, acupuncture, and decompression therapy. We have dedicated our lives to learning time-tested techniques that heal patients. We specialize in researched-based treatments that have successfully helped patients cope with their unique problems. We treat each patient individually with care. Each patient is given the time they need to get better. We will take the time to help you understand your body so we can achieve your health goals together. We have the resources for you to live healthy and feel better. We Treat: - Pain - Neck - Low Back - Sciatica - Arthritis - Injury - Accidents - Neuropathy - Stroke - Strength Rehabilitation - Menstrual Disorders - Menopause - Infertility - Digestive Disorders - High Cholesterol - Constipation - Low Energy - Weight Loss - Hypertension - Insomnia - Anxiety - Immune Disorders - Allergies - Colds - Flu - Any Many Other Diseases Our practice is dedicated to serving the Fontana, Rancho Cucamonga, Rialto, Upland, Ontario, Jurupa Valley, Pomona, Chino, Riverside, San Bernardino, and Inland Empire region
